summary: Itinerary UI project with theme options; currently supports Doodle and Retro, and plans to add a third Plain theme option. UI tweaks requested for selected elements include removing a star logo and enabling full text wrapping.
known_issues: Deployment/build process intermittently fails with generic 'Deployment error' / 'Oops, something went wrong with our AI' messages.

existing_features.title: Remove the star logo/icon from the selected Element 1 button (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[3]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/button[1]) without removing or changing the button’s click behavior.

Ensure the selected Element 2 button’s text wraps onto multiple lines when long, and that the full text content is visible (no truncation/ellipsis) (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[3]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/button[2]).

Add a third itinerary theme option named "Plain" alongside the existing Doodle and Retro themes, selectable via the existing theme controls represented by the selected Element 1 and Element 2 buttons (XPaths above). When Plain is selected, apply a minimal, neutral, "plain itinerary" visual style to ONLY the selected itinerary content elements (Element 3 XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[5]/div[1]/div[7]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1], Element 4 XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[5]/div[1]/div[7]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2], Element 5 XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[5]/div[1]/div[7]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[3]/p[2]).

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the star logo from Element 1
Enable text wrapping for Element 2 so long text displays fully
Add a third 'Plain' itinerary theme option alongside Doodle and Retro, selectable via the existing theme controls

projectName: Add third Plain itinerary theme and adjust selected theme controls (remove star icon, wrap long text)
